title: What just happened in Syria?
summary: Assad family ruled Syria for more than 50 years with an iron fist . Bashar al-Assad became president after the death in 2000 of his father Hafez, who had ruled for almost three decades . In 2011, he brutally crushed a peaceful pro-democracy uprising sparking a devastating civil war . More than half a million people have been killed and 12 million others forced to flee their homes .
